text: Mandi Bahauddin District () is a district in the Punjab province of Pakistan. The city of Mandi Bahauddin is the capital. The district has three tehsils, these are: * Malakwal Tehsil * Mandi Bahauddin Tehsil * Phalia Tehsil ==References== Category:Gujranwala Division
title: Mandi Bahauddin District
